name: Operation: Tiamat
description:
A vehicular action game where you pilot the ship Bahamut as you defend the world from the Trak'ab and their massive flagship Tiamat. The game is split between three distinct levels - land, sea, and space. The game also includes a deathmatch based multiplayer.

This game was made over the course of the 2017-2018 school year by a high school team and was shown at the state level SkillsUSA competition.

Authors

Andrew Sylvester - Programmer

Jason Foster - UI, Programmer

Tyler Patterson - Models, Level Design

and Original music by Zach Wilson
